synopsis.text: If you're a fan of idol-training games, you'll love this anime inspired by a mobile game from Liber Entertainment and Pony Canyon! Welcome to AiRBLUE, a newly established voice acting agency filled with aspiring voice actors, each brimming with unique personalities. Despite their lack of experience, these determined individuals strive to make their dreams come true in the competitive world of voice acting. However, not everyone can succeed, as the harsh reality of failed auditions looms over them. Will they be able to overcome the challenges and rise to the top? Join these rookie voice actors as they navigate through the ups and downs of the industry, learning valuable lessons along the way. Don't miss out on the journey of these budding stars in the making!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
